title: 250 minutes daily
info: 250 minutes of calls for 1 day at the price of 10 Afghanis. Only from 10 pm to 5:59 am. To activate N10 and to deactivate send PUN10 to 3378.

title: 750 minutes weekly
info: 750 minutes of calls for 7 days at the price of 35 afghans. Only from 10 pm to 5:59 am. To activate N35 and to deactivate send PUN35 to 3378.

title: 4000 minutes per month
info: 4000 minutes of calls for 30 days at the price of 199 Afghanis. Only from 10 pm to 5:59 am. To activate, send PU199 to 3378.
